Html:
in the process of upgrading to Silverlight 4  + Visual Studio 2010 i have downloaded the latest version - 41709.

where do i find V4 assemblies ?

Hi,

The files you’ve downloaded contain the source code of the CAL. You must compile it in order to get the assemblies, as with previous Prism bits.

Please take into account that this is the starting point for Prism v4. On a related subject, you can complete this survey to provide your input about Prism v4 features.

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi

i haven't been clear enough...

i downloaded and compiled (first with errors) the whole solution.

do i get the assemblies from the same folder as in previous version?

that is ...CompositeWPF-41709\V4\CAL\Silverlight\Composite.UnityExtensions\Bin\Debug

am i right?

Hi,

Yes, you can find the assemblies in the same folder as in the previous version. Remember, however, that there is a new build as of yesterday.

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
